text: Takkha Pumi Nikhuo kha inruup kajuo angnga ajuosik eii. Khawa Nikhuoni khan marwaan ngaihi rasa inringtakle inruoiya lamangsik eii, lairalak-ah kaom rakip um kaangta lamangsik eii, halli nuoipilchung khat-um khanna kaom phur rakip alamangsik eii. Matt 24:43; Luk 12:39; 1 Thes 5:2; Chonglar 16:15
